item.title: Angular
item.author: Author
item.description: Angular is an application design framework and development platform for creating efficient and sophisticated single-page apps. Uses Typescript . Features Validation Routing Unit Testing Typescript Components @angular/core @angular/compiler @angular/http @angular/router Concepts Modules - RootModule (AppModule) Component - RootComponent (AppComponent) - HTML + Class Template - View - HTML Class - Code - TypeScript Metadata - Information - Decorator Services - Business Logic Interpolation Interpolation is a technique that allows the user to bind a value to a UI element.
